quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
Ordinary riches can be stolen; real riches cannot. In your soul are infinitely precious things that cannot be taken from you.
If time be of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.
The charity that is a trifle to us can be precious to others.
My share of the work may be limited, but the fact that it is work makes it precious.
I know that inner wisdom is more precious than wealth. The more you spend it, the more you gain.
Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
Truth is life's most precious commodity.
More precious is want with honesty than wealth with infamy.
The most precious of all possessions is power over ourselves.
There is precious instruction to be got by finding we were wrong.
An enemy is indeed a precious teacher.
Sometimes when you sacrifice something precious, you're not really losing it. You're just passing it on to someone else.
Some things are more precious because they don't last long.
Genius, like gold and precious stones, is chiefly prized because of its rarity.
A man that seeks truth and loves it must be reckoned precious to any human society.
Life is too short, too precious, too painful to waste on worldly bubbles that burst.
The things that are most precious to us are sometimes the most secret.
Life every man holds dear but the dear man holds honor far more precious dear than life.
We spend precious hours fearing the inevitable. It would be wise to use that time adoring our families, cherishing our friends, and living our lives.
The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
The search for truth is more precious than its possession.
Any relic of the dead is precious, if they were valued living.
My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
The gift of life is so precious that we should feel an obligation to pay back the universe for the gift of being alive.
Your wealth can be stolen, but the precious riches buried deep in your soul cannot.
The words that enlighten the soul are more precious than jewels.
The left-handed are precious; they take places which are inconvenient for the rest.
